_description: Complete JSON test data for all APIs

auth_register_farmer2._description: Register Farmer - Age 28, DoB: 1997-12-20, Hindi speaker

auth_register_farmer3._description: Register Farmer - Age 55, young farmer borders eligibility

auth_get_profile._description: Get farmer profile with auto-computed age from DoB

scheme_create_pmkisan._description: Create PM-KISAN scheme - Central government, income & land eligibility
scheme_create_pmkisan.description: Under this scheme, the central government provides ₹6,000 per year in three equal installments to small and marginal farmer families having combined landholding up to 2 hectares.
scheme_create_pmkisan.benefitDetails: ₹6,000 per year in 3 installments of ₹2,000 each, directly transferred to farmer's bank account.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for PM-KISAN?
faqs.answer: All small and marginal farmer families with combined landholding up to 2 hectares are eligible.

faqs.question: How much money will I receive?
faqs.answer: ₹6,000 per year in three installments of ₹2,000 each.

faqs.question: PM-KISAN కోసం ఎవరు అర్హులు?
faqs.answer: 2 హెక్టార్ల వరకు భూమి కలిగిన అన్ని చిన్న మరియు సన్నకారు రైతు కుటుంబాలు అర్హులు.

faqs.question: PM-KISAN के लिए मुझे कितना पैसा मिलेगा?

scheme_create_soil_health._description: Create Soil Health Card Scheme - Central, minimum 0.5 hectare land required
scheme_create_soil_health.description: The Soil Health Card Scheme provides soil health cards to farmers with crop-wise recommendations of nutrients and fertilizers.
scheme_create_soil_health.benefitDetails: Free soil testing and personalized soil health card with nutrient recommendations for your specific land.

faqs.question: What is a Soil Health Card?
faqs.answer: It is a printed report that tells you about the nutrient status of your soil and recommendations on dosage of fertilizers.

faqs.question: Is there any cost?
faqs.answer: No, soil testing and the health card are provided free of charge.

scheme_create_rythu_bandhu_telangana._description: Create Rythu Bandhu - Telangana state scheme, ₹10,000 per acre per year
scheme_create_rythu_bandhu_telangana.description: Rythu Bandhu is the Telangana state government's investment support scheme for agriculture. It provides financial assistance of ₹10,000 per acre per year to all land-owning farmers for two crop seasons.
scheme_create_rythu_bandhu_telangana.benefitDetails: ₹10,000 per acre per year (₹5,000 per season × 2 seasons) for all land-owning farmers in Telangana.

faqs.question: Who can avail Rythu Bandhu in Telangana?
faqs.answer: All land-owning farmers in Telangana state with pattadar passbook are eligible.

faqs.question: రైతు బంధు కోసం ఎంపిక చేయబడిన రాష్ట్రంలో ఎవరు అర్హులు?
faqs.answer: తెలంగాణ రాష్ట్రంలో పట్టాదార్ పాస్బుక్ కలిగిన అన్ని భూ యజమాని రైతులు అర్హులు.

scheme_create_crop_insurance._description: Create PMFBY - Crop insurance with AND/OR groups, multiple crops (IN operator)
scheme_create_crop_insurance.description: PMFBY provides crop insurance to farmers at very low premium rates. Covers natural calamities, pests, and diseases.
scheme_create_crop_insurance.benefitDetails: Crop insurance at subsidized premiums (2% Kharif, 1.5% Rabi) covering natural calamities, pests, and diseases.

faqs.question: What crops are covered under PMFBY?
faqs.answer: All notified crops including food crops (cereals, millets, pulses), oilseeds, and commercial/horticultural crops.

faqs.question: What is the premium rate?
faqs.answer: Kharif: 2%, Rabi: 1.5%, Commercial & Horticultural: 5% of the sum insured.

scheme_create_housing._description: Create PMAY-G housing scheme - income & age based
scheme_create_housing.description: PMAY-G provides financial assistance for construction of pucca houses to eligible rural families who are houseless or living in kutcha/dilapidated houses.
scheme_create_housing.benefitDetails: ₹1.20 lakh in plain areas and ₹1.30 lakh in hilly/difficult areas for house construction.

faqs.question: How much assistance is provided under PMAY-G?
faqs.answer: ₹1.20 lakh in plains and ₹1.30 lakh in hilly areas for house construction.

user_fields_farmer_radha._description: Save farmer's known fields (land size, income, crops)

user_fields_farmer_suresh._description: Save different farmer's fields (larger land, higher income)

eligibility_discover_partial_data._description: DISCOVER mode - Farmer provides only partial data (land, income), skip missing fields
eligibility_discover_partial_data._expectedResult: Shows potential schemes farmer might match, skips rules for missing fields

eligibility_verify_full_profile._description: VERIFY mode - Farmer provides complete profile, strict rule evaluation
eligibility_verify_full_profile._expectedResult: Returns eligible, almost eligible, and ineligible schemes with detailed reasons

eligibility_almost_eligible_scenario._description: Farmer exceeds income limit by ₹10k - should appear as 'almost eligible' for PM-KISAN
eligibility_almost_eligible_scenario._expectedResult: PM-KISAN in almostEligibleSchemes with hint: 'You could also qualify for PM-KISAN if your annual income is below ₹1.5L'

eligibility_ineligible_scenario._description: Farmer with very large land (3.5 acres > 2 acre limit) and high income - fails PM-KISAN
eligibility_ineligible_scenario._expectedResult: PM-KISAN in ineligibleSchemes with reason: 'You need land size of at most 2 acres and annual income of at most ₹1.5L to qualify.'

eligibility_state_based._description: Farmer from Telangana checks Rythu Bandhu (state-specific scheme)

eligibility_crop_based._description: Farmer growing Paddy checks crop insurance - should qualify because Paddy is IN list

eligibility_crop_not_covered._description: Farmer growing Sunflower (not in PMFBY list) - should fail that scheme

eligibility_multiple_crops._description: Farmer growing multiple crops (Paddy + Wheat) - should match IN operator
eligibility_multiple_crops._expectedResult: PMFBY should be eligible because both Paddy and Wheat are in the list

browse_all_schemes._description: Browse all active schemes - no filters
browse_all_schemes._expectedResponse: Array of SchemeCardResponse with all 5 created schemes

browse_central_schemes._description: Browse only Central government schemes (state = null)
browse_central_schemes._expectedResponse: PM-KISAN, Soil Health Card, PMFBY, PMAY-G (all have state=null)

browse_central_insurance._description: Browse Central schemes in Insurance category

scheme_detail_english._description: Get full scheme detail with English FAQs
scheme_detail_english._expectedResponse: Complete scheme with eligibility groups, rules, and English FAQs

scheme_detail_telugu._description: Get scheme detail with Telugu FAQs
scheme_detail_telugu._expectedResponse: Same scheme but filtered FAQs in Telugu language

scheme_detail_hindi._description: Get scheme detail with Hindi FAQs
scheme_detail_hindi._expectedResponse: Same scheme but filtered FAQs in Hindi language

scheme_detail_default._description: Get scheme detail without language filter - returns all FAQs
scheme_detail_default._expectedResponse: Complete scheme with all FAQs in all languages

flow_new_farmer_complete._description: Complete flow: Register → Login → Save Fields → Check Eligibility → Browse Schemes → View Detail

flow_eligibility_state_check._description: Farmer from Telangana checking state-specific schemes
_steps: 1. User logs in (farmerId=1, state=Telangana from district)
4. Expected: See Rythu Bandhu in eligible schemes
3. Expected: PM-KISAN moves from 'eligible' to 'almost eligible' with hint message

edge_case_age_boundary._description: Test farmer exactly at age 18 minimum
edge_case_age_boundary._note: Farmer born 2008-02-24 = exactly 18 years old on 2026-02-24

edge_case_land_exact_limit._description: Test farmer with exactly 2 hectares (PM-KISAN limit)
edge_case_land_exact_limit._expectedResult: Should be eligible for PM-KISAN (<= operator includes 2.0)

edge_case_income_exact_limit._description: Test farmer with exactly ₹150,000 income (PM-KISAN limit)
edge_case_income_exact_limit._expectedResult: Should be eligible for PM-KISAN (<= operator includes 150000)

edge_case_zero_land._description: Farmer with 0 land - should fail landSize >= rules
edge_case_zero_land._expectedResult: All schemes requiring land should fail

edge_case_missing_required_field._description: VERIFY mode with missing critical field (income) - should fail PM-KISAN
edge_case_missing_required_field._expectedResult: PM-KISAN fails because income field is missing in VERIFY mode

edge_case_discover_missing_all_optional._description: DISCOVER mode with minimal data (age only from profile)
edge_case_discover_missing_all_optional._expectedResult: Schemes show with missingFields list indicating which fields were not evaluated
